author: coffeebank
install_msg: Thanks for installing, I hope you enjoy :) To stay up to date with breaking changes, you might want to join my Support Discord. To find documentation, Discord, and more, drop by the GitHub repo at https://github.com/coffeebank/coffee-cogs
name: msgmover
short: Move messages across channels and servers
description:
Make moving messages between channels and servers easy and integrated.

'msgcopy': Copies messages from one channel to another
'msgrelay': Link up two channels within a server/relay messages across servers

Uses webhooks, with configs for showing usernames/profile pics, attachments, and more. Supports replies, attachments, and embeds (including bot command responses). Supports forwarding a channel to multiple channels/webhooks. Includes timestamp spacers when copying messages.
end_user_data_statement: This cog does not store any End User Data.
